Country Name: Data from database: Global Financial Development

Series Name: Short definition

The percentage of respondents with an account (self or together with someone else) at a bank	 credit union	 another financial institution (e.g.	 cooperative	 microfinance institution)	 or the post office (if applicable) including respondents who reported having a debit card (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents with an account (self or together with someone else) at a bank	 credit union	 another financial institution (e.g.	 cooperative	 microfinance institution)	 or the post office (if applicable) including respondents who reported having a debit card (% age 15+). The values correspond to Global Findex variable fin1_t_a.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank

Country Code: Saved at a financial institution (% age 15+)
Series Name: The percentage of respondents who report saving or setting aside any money by using an account at a formal financial institution such as a bank	 credit union	 microfinance institution	 or cooperative in the past 12 months (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents who report saving or setting aside any money by using an account at a formal financial institution such as a bank	 credit union	 microfinance institution	 or cooperative in the past 12 months (% age 15+). The values correspond to Global Findex variable fin17a_t_a.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank

Country Code: Received wages: into a financial institution account (% age 15+)
Series Name: The percentage of respondents who report using their accounts at a formal financial institution to receive money or payments for work or from selling goods in the past 12 months (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents who report using their accounts at a formal financial institution to receive money or payments for work or from selling goods in the past 12 months (% age 15+). The values correspond to Global Findex variable fin34a_t_a.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank

Series Name: The percentage of respondents with a credit card (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents with a credit card (% age 15+). The variables correspond to Global Findex variable fin7_t_a.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank

Series Name: The percentage of respondents with a debit card (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents with a debit card (% age 15+). The variables correspond to Global Findex variable fin2_t_a.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank

Country Code: Made digital payments in the past year (% age 15+)
Series Name: The percentage of respondents who used electronic payments (payments that one makes or that are made automatically including wire transfers or payments made online) in the past 12 months to make payments on bills or to buy things using money from their accounts (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents who used electronic payments (payments that one makes or that are made automatically including wire transfers or payments made online) in the past 12 months to make payments on bills or to buy things using money from their accounts (% age 15+). The variables correspond to Global Findex variable g20_t_made.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank

Country Code: Paid utility bills: using a mobile phone (% age 15+)
Series Name: The percentage of respondents who report using a mobile phone to pay bills in the past 12 months (% age 15+).
Series Code: The percentage of respondents who report using a mobile phone to pay bills in the past 12 months (% age 15+). The variables correspond to Global Findex variable fin31b_t_a.
2021 [YR2021]: Global Financial Inclusion (Global Findex) Database	 World Bank
